name: NeetMare
description:
CONTROLS: 

WASD - move

E - Interact

Space - next dialogue

Left-click - interact with inventory

GAME DESCRIPTION:

Willow is a neet who spends most of her time scrolling image boards, when one day she falls asleep and ends up in a place known as the "underworld". 

The only choice she has is to work together with michevious demons to get back home.

This game was made as a 10 day solo project and all pieces of content in this game were created by Lewis Nicholson (LJNarts)

KNOWN BUGS: 

Make sure not to press E again when in a dialogue or it will break the sequence. (will be fixed shortly)
